metadata.description: The name you provide will be appended with a unique sting to make it globally available. The name can contain only letters, numbers and hyphens. The first and last characters must be a letter or number. Spaces are not allowed.
The name you provide will be appended with a unique sting to make it globally available. The field can contain only lowercase letters and numbers. Name must be between 1 and 11 characters.
Location of the data factory. Currently, only East US, East US 2, and West Europe are supported.
Please specify if you want to write curated data into SQL database.

The name you provide will be appended with a unique sting to make it globally available. Your server name can contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and '-', but can't start or end with '-' or have more than 50 characters.
Value should not match special patterns. It should contain a length of maximum of 128.

Your login name must not contain a SQL Identifier or a typical system name (like admin, administrator, sa, root, dbmanager, loginmanager, etc.) or a built-in database user or role (like dbo, guest, public, etc.)
Please specify comma separated email addresses on which you would like to receive the ADF pipeline alerts.
Specifies the name of the key vault.

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	filename as string ('demographics_curated_data'),
	runid as string ('runtime_guid')
}
source(output(
		County as string,
		Per_Capita_Personal_Income_In_Dollars_In_2017 as long,
		Per_Capita_Personal_Income_In_Dollars_In_2018 as long,
		Per_Capita_Personal_Income_In_Dollars_In_2019 as long,
		Per_Capita_Personal_Income_Rank_In_State_In_2019 as long,
		Percent_Change_From_Preceding_Period_In_2018 as double,
		Percent_Change_From_Preceding_Period_In_2019 as double,
		Percent_Change_From_Preceding_Period_Rank_In_State_In_2019 as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'lineage',
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	multiLineRow: true) ~> sourceCSV
sourceCSV derive(Load_time = currentTimestamp(),
		Load_date = currentDate()) ~> AddNewColumns
DeleteUnwantedRows select(mapColumn(
		Load_date,
		Load_time,
		County,
		Per_Capita_Personal_Income_In_Dollars_In_2017,
		Per_Capita_Personal_Income_In_Dollars_In_2018,
		Per_Capita_Personal_Income_In_Dollars_In_2019,
		Per_Capita_Personal_Income_Rank_In_State_In_2019,
		Percent_Change_From_Preceding_Period_In_2018,
		Percent_Change_From_Preceding_Period_In_2019,
		Percent_Change_From_Preceding_Period_Rank_In_State_In_2019
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DropUnwantedColumns
AddNewColumns filter(not(isNull(Per_Capita_Personal_Income_Rank_In_State_In_2019))) ~> DeleteUnwantedRows
DropUnwantedColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[(concat($filename, '.csv'))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkLatestCSV
DropUnwantedColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[(concat($filename, '.jsonl'))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkLatestJsonl
DropUnwantedColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[(concat($filename,'_', $runid,'.csv'))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkCSV
DropUnwantedColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[(concat($filename,'_', $runid,'.jsonl'))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkJsonl
DropUnwantedColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concat($filename, '.parquet'))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkLatestParquet
DropUnwantedColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concat($filename,'_', $runid,'.parquet'))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkParquet

parameters{
	filename as string ('demographics_curated_data'),
	runid as string ('runtime_guid')
}
source(output(
		County as string,
		Per_Capita_Personal_Income_In_Dollars_In_2017 as long,
		Per_Capita_Personal_Income_In_Dollars_In_2018 as long,
		Per_Capita_Personal_Income_In_Dollars_In_2019 as long,
		Per_Capita_Personal_Income_Rank_In_State_In_2019 as long,
		Percent_Change_From_Preceding_Period_In_2018 as double,
		Percent_Change_From_Preceding_Period_In_2019 as double,
		Percent_Change_From_Preceding_Period_Rank_In_State_In_2019 as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'lineage',
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	multiLineRow: true) ~> sourceCSV
sourceCSV derive(Load_time = currentTimestamp(),
		Load_date = currentDate()) ~> AddNewColumns
DeleteUnwantedRows select(mapColumn(
		Load_date,
		Load_time,
		County,
		Per_Capita_Personal_Income_In_Dollars_In_2017,
		Per_Capita_Personal_Income_In_Dollars_In_2018,
		Per_Capita_Personal_Income_In_Dollars_In_2019,
		Per_Capita_Personal_Income_Rank_In_State_In_2019,
		Percent_Change_From_Preceding_Period_In_2018,
		Percent_Change_From_Preceding_Period_In_2019,
		Percent_Change_From_Preceding_Period_Rank_In_State_In_2019
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DropUnwantedColumns
AddNewColumns filter(not(isNull(Per_Capita_Personal_Income_Rank_In_State_In_2019))) ~> DeleteUnwantedRows
DropUnwantedColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[(concat($filename, '.csv'))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkLatestCSV
DropUnwantedColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[(concat($filename, '.jsonl'))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkLatestJsonl
DropUnwantedColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[(concat($filename,'_', $runid,'.csv'))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkCSV
DropUnwantedColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[(concat($filename,'_', $runid,'.jsonl'))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkJsonl
DropUnwantedColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concat($filename, '.parquet'))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkLatestParquet
DropUnwantedColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concat($filename,'_', $runid,'.parquet'))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkParquet
DropUnwantedColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sinkSQL

ifTrueActivities.name: Alert Current Schema Has Less Columns
Alert Current Schema Has More Columns
Alert Equal Number But Different Names Or Arrangement

sqlReaderQuery.value:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = 'lowerIncome')
BEGIN
EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA lowerIncome')
END
IF NOT EXISTS (
    select * 
    from sys.objects 
    WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[lowerIncome].[DataTypeChangedProc]')
    )
BEGIN
    EXEC('CREATE PROCEDURE lowerIncome.DataTypeChangedProc AS IF OBJECT_ID(''lowerIncome.storeProcTable'', ''u'') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE lowerIncome.storeProcTable; CREATE TABLE lowerIncome.storeProcTable( table1_name varchar(255), Column1_name varchar(255), DATA_TYPE1 varchar(255), table2_name varchar(255), Column2_name varchar(255), DATA_TYPE2 varchar(255) ); INSERT INTO lowerIncome.storeProcTable SELECT c1.table_name, c1.COLUMN_NAME, c1.DATA_TYPE, c2.table_name, c2.COLUMN_NAME, c2.DATA_TYPE FROM [INFORMATION_SCHEMA].[COLUMNS] c1 INNER JOIN [INFORMATION_SCHEMA].[COLUMNS] c2 ON (c1.COLUMN_NAME = c2.COLUMN_NAME AND c1.data_type <> c2.DATA_TYPE) WHERE c1.table_name=''curatedTable'' AND c2.table_name = ''previousTable'';')
    select Count(*) from sys.symmetric_keys;
END

ELSE

BEGIN
    select Count(*) from sys.symmetric_keys;
END

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = 'lowerIncome')
BEGIN
EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA lowerIncome')
select Count(*) from sys.symmetric_keys;
END
ELSE
BEGIN
    select Count(*) from sys.symmetric_keys;
END

sink.preCopyScript:
IF OBJECT_ID('[lowerIncome].[previousTableSaveCopy]', 'U') IS NOT NULL

BEGIN

DROP TABLE [lowerIncome].[previousTableSaveCopy];

END

IF OBJECT_ID('[lowerIncome].[previousTable]', 'U') IS NOT NULL

BEGIN

DROP TABLE [lowerIncome].[previousTable]; 

END

properties.description: It is to notify that the current schema of the source has less column(s) than the schema of the same source previously detected.

dimensions.name: Name
values: Alert Current Schema Has Less Columns

properties.description: It is to notify that the current schema of the source has more column(s) than the schema of the same source previously detected.

dimensions.name: Name
values: Alert Current Schema Has More Columns

properties.description: It is to notify that the current schema of the source has same number of columns as the schema of the same source previously detected but either the arrangement of the columns is different or one or more columns have different names.

dimensions.name: Name
values: Alert Equal Number But Different Names Or Arrangement

properties.description: Change in data type for one or more column(s) has been detected in the sql table
